title: Amazon S3
label: Limitations
value:
AWS S3 is a chargeback service and an NYU chartfield is required for chargeback.
Max individual file upload size is 5TB.

title: Amazon S3
label: Permission Settings
value: Restricted access by individual or group.

title: Amazon S3
label: Use Case
value: Archive and long-term, high-security storage of large datasets.

title: Distributed storage on the HSRN
label: Limitations
value: 2TB limit with 60 day purge policy for untouched files

title: File Sharing (Windows)
label: Backup
value: Backed up daily, retains last 30 days; monitored 24x7

title: File Sharing (Windows)
label: Limitations
value: Workstations will have to be joined to NYU's Active Directory

title: File Sharing (Windows)
label: Permission Settings
value: Options for read only, modify, or remove. Activated in NYU's Active Directory security groups via role-based access.

title: File Sharing (Windows)
label: Synchronous Access
value: Unlimited access to the file share but files can only be editable by one person unless the application allows otherwise.

title: File Sharing (Windows)
label: Use Case
value: NYU departments that want to store & share files of low & moderate security

title: HPC AI Storage
label: Limitations
value: 2TB limit with 60 day purge policy for untouched files

title: HPC Research Project Space
label: Alumni Access
value: Available to Alumni and external collaborators with sponsorship.

title: HPC Research Project Space
label: Eligibility
value: Faculty, Researcher, and Graduate Student HPC user account holders.

title: HPC Research Project Space
label: Limitations
value:
Storage space and number of inodes (files) are available for a fee. 

No limit on the amount of storage that can be purchased, but significant purchases may require approval.

title: HPC Research Project Space
label: Permission Settings
value:
Restricted access by individual or group using Access Control Lists (ACLs).

Sharing with external collaborators is possible using Globus Data Transfer Node .

title: HPC Research Project Space
label: Use Case
value: Use of the high-security HPC environment to actively analyze research data.

title: HPC Scratch
label: Limitations
value: 2TB limit with 60 day purge policy for untouched files

title: NYU Box
label: Backup
value: Retains up to 100 previous versions of a single file

title: NYU Box
label: Limitations
value: Max upload is 50 GB for an single file

title: NYU Box
label: Permission Settings
value: Permissions granted by NYU IT Admin

title: NYU Box
label: Synchronous Access
value: Up to 20 users can edit and comment simultaneously

title: NYU Box
label: Use Case
value: Storage of NYU data with high security & the ability to collaborate with external associates

title: NYU Google Drive
label: Limitations
value:
My Drive: max storage is 20 GB
Shared Drives: max storage TBD

title: NYU Google Drive
label: Permission Settings
value: View, comment, edit and temp access to comment and view

title: NYU Google Drive
label: Synchronous Access
value: Up to 100 users can edit & comment simultaneously

title: NYU Google Drive
label: Use Case
value: Storage of NYU data with moderate security & the ability to collaborate with external associates

title: NYU Shared Google Drive
label: Limitations
value:
My Drive: max storage is 20 GB
Shared Drives: max storage TBD

title: NYU Shared Google Drive
label: Permission Settings
value: View, comment, edit and temp access to comment and view

title: NYU Shared Google Drive
label: Synchronous Access
value: Up to 100 users can edit & comment simultaneously

title: NYU Shared Google Drive
label: Use Case
value: Storage of NYU data with moderate security & the ability to collaborate with external associates

title: NYU Stream
label: Limitations
value: User must have nyu.edu account; Student must be actively enrolled

title: NYU Stream
label: Permission Settings
value: Options to restrict access to content by individual or group

title: Qualtrics
label: Eligibility
value: Current Faculty, Retired Faculty, Staff, Students & Researchers

title: Qualtrics
label: Limitations
value: No limit for storage, 10 GB export limit per CSV file

title: Qualtrics
label: Permission Settings
value: One owner, adjustable collaboration permissions for teamwork

title: Qualtrics
label: Use Case
value: To create and administer web surveys for research, teaching and administrative purposes

title: REDCap
label: Eligibility
value: Faculty, Research staff, Student research affiliates & External research collaborators

title: REDCap
label: Permission Settings
value: Customizable rights, roles and access to data can be given for collaborators with an approved NYU REDCap account

title: REDCap
label: Use Case
value: A secure web application for managing online surveys that involves collection of High Risk data and in compliance with multiple government standards

title: Research Data Lake (Pilot)
label: Limitations
value: During pilot phase, projects must be approved by RTS staff

title: Research Data Lake (Pilot)
label: Permission Settings
value: Project dependent, role-based permissions. Users added by PI request

title: Research Data Lake (Pilot)
label: Use Case
value: High-performance storage for active research datasets with multiple users. Supports structured and semi-structured data

title: Research Workspace
label: Eligibility
value: Faculty; or Staff/Student with full-time faculty sponsorship

title: Research Workspace
label: Limitations
value: Requires faculty, staff; or student with full-time NYU faculty sponsorship

title: Research Workspace
label: Permission Settings
value: Options for fully private, read only, or editable

title: Research Workspace
label: Use Case
value: Storage of NYU research data & collaboration with non-NYU researchers

title: Secure Research Data Environments
label: Eligibility
value: Faculty; or Staff/Student with full-time faculty sponsorship

title: Secure Research Data Environments
label: Permission Settings
value: Project dependent, role-based permissions, requires data steward role

title: Secure Research Data Environments
label: Use Case
value: Researchers using the HPC clusters to data analysis of simulations sharing data amongst group members

title: Spatial Data Repository
label: Use Case
value: A collection of Geospatial Data from Open Data and proprietary resources. Users can download layers and work with them in many GIS platforms

title: Ultraviolet Repository
label: Limitations
value: Recommended to 100 files or 50GB (per file), contact repository team uv@nyu.edu if exceeds this limit

title: Ultraviolet Repository
label: Use Case
value: To deposit scholarly materials as open access publication and long-term preservation
